::Liono::
Liono laughs under his breath "You demand I trust you? A fat person demands 
to be skinny and ugly person demands to be beautiful. Only a person with 
dishonorable means would demand trust because it is the only way he can 
receive it." Liono sighs "I will stay for the meeting but I will not remove 
my weapons by reason your last statement gives me grounds not to trust you."
